name: Nom Nom (zeph)
description:
Nom Nom is a 1-bit pixel art styled game where you play as a piggy little blob that likes to eat monsters! I didn't have enough time to complete everything for the jam but the main structure of the game is there.

HOW TO PLAY

Try to stay alive and survive as many waves as you can as they get progressively tougher with bigger, stronger enemies. Your size is your lifeline, and as a result it's important to stay big.

 Eat smaller mobs and apples and shoot down bigger ones as they're too big to consume. However, the more you shoot, you sacrifice a bit of your size, so use it wisely. 

CONTROLS

WASD - MOVE

X - SHOOT

Z - EAT

R - RESTART GAME
